descriptions.name: Bonsai Ethereum Strategy
descriptions.shortDescription: Bonsai is a powerful and intuitive trading algorithm that uses leading indicators to predict future price action and make profitable trading decisions. This strategy is a swing strategy for Ethereum.
descriptions.description:
Bonsai is a cutting-edge trading algorithm that employs leading indicators to predict future price action and make informed trading decisions. Named after the ancient Japanese art of growing miniature trees, Bonsai is designed to be both precise and patient in its approach to trading.

Using a combination of technical analysis and artificial intelligence, Bonsai is able to analyze price action to identify key trends and patterns. Using leading indicators, Bonsai is able to determine the current market direction and forecast future price movements.

Bonsai's advanced algorithms are also able to identify potential trading opportunities and risks by analyzing a wide range of market data, including historical price data, momentum, Fibonacci retracements, as well as key levels of support and resistance. By combining this data with its understanding of leading indicators, Bonsai is able to make informed trading decisions that maximize profits while minimizing risks.

descriptions.name: Solama Wool
descriptions.shortDescription: Candle Effect - SOLANA Strategy
descriptions.description:
Welcome to Candle Effect

Our SOLANA trading strategy is tested and optimized for a long time before being available to public. This is also true for all our trading strategies. We keep backtesting each strategy for optimal profits on a regular basis to ensure the strategies are working along the market trend.

This strategy is based on DCA (Dollar Cost Average) that will buy down everytime our algorithm finds a good entry opportunity. Trades should be fast, normally everything is closed withing 24h. There will be several signals every day.

Recommended Minimum Funds on x10 Leverage (drawdown NOT included): 256$

For any questions please contact me
- on Astrabit discord channel
- on my private Discord at https://discord.com/invite/UGrEy2MZSX

descriptions.name: Boreas
descriptions.shortDescription: Avalanche (AVAX) Strategy deriving from a swing trade perspective
descriptions.description:
Boreas is the god of the north wind or the god of winter. He comes down from the Thrake mountains bringing icy air and snow each winter.

As strong as the winter winds, Boreas (AVAX) strategy carries the same power and energy in its swing trades 


NOTE: “Elevate tests and optimizes all our trading strategies on a reasonably regular basis so as to ensure that the strategies are best suited to the most recent market data. You should always refer to the most RECENT version of the included trade results. Please review all the information provided to you including but not limited to; individual trade drawdowns, run ups, net profits etc., so that you may freely decide what risk management, take profit, leverage etc. strategies are best for you and your trading objectives. 

IMPORTANT: ALL ELEVATE RESULTS ARE NET OF FEES AND DO NOT INCLUDE ANY LEVERAGE OR MARGIN. These are EQUITY ONLY results and are based on a 100% reinvestment rate (ie; you reinvest your profits and allow them to compound). Past results and backtested results do not guarantee future performance. Given your use of leverage and stop losses, your results may differ.”

descriptions.name: Goblin Chop Bot (BTC)
descriptions.shortDescription: A BTC scalping strategy with a 74% win rate.
descriptions.description: The Goblin Chop Bot is designed to thrive in any market conditions. Boasting a 74% win rate and 7.6% max portfolio drawdown, Goblin is a high-efficiency scalper. The max loss on a single trade is 3.8% so traders should consider using leverage responsibly to maximize results. Goblin is a low-frequency trading strategy that averages ~20 trades per month so don't expect constant activity. It trades specific parameters on a low timeframe for quick scalps that add up to big gains.

descriptions.name: Horus
descriptions.shortDescription: 3H Swing ETH BOT
descriptions.description:
HORUS is Elevate's ETH Swing trading strategy designed to exploit and profit from medium and longer term trends. HORUS operates on a medium-to-high time frame which helps it capture bigger swing trends while cutting out some of the noise, but it can mean that it is slower to react and correct a trade that goes wrong. 

HORUS will generally underperform in tight, ranging markets that are very volatile. The overall MAX drawdown is less than 20% but Individual trade drawdowns can vary with some that are large coming strongly back into profit and others that can cause losses. 

It is important that you review all the information provided to you, especially the individual trade drawdowns, run ups, net profits etc., so that you may freely decide what risk management, take profit, leverage etc. choices are best for you and your trading objectives. 

IMPORTANT: HORUS ETH RESULTS ARE NET OF FEES AND DO NOT INCLUDE ANY LEVERAGE OR MARGIN. These are EQUITY ONLY results and are based on a 100% reinvestment rate (ie; you reinvest your profits and allow them to compound). Past results and backtested results do not guarantee future performance. Given your use of leverage and stop losses, your results may differ. 

HORUS will work best as a SPOT style strategy (ie LOW or NO leverage/margin).




NOTE: “Elevate tests and optimizes all our trading strategies on a reasonably regular basis so as to ensure that the strategies are best suited to the most recent market data. You should always refer to the most RECENT version of the included trade results. descriptions.name: Troll Bot
descriptions.shortDescription: A second take on scalping BTC that compliments Goblin.
descriptions.description: The Troll Bot takes a different approach to scalping BTC compared to Goblin. For starters it has a higher risk to reward (1.4 to 1). Pair that with a 64% win rate since Jan 2021 and that leads to the back test results below. The other major benefit to Troll Bot is that it tends to perform well in market conditions that are difficult for Goblin and Gremlin so it's a nice hedge against Goblin/Gremlin drawdowns.

descriptions.name: ENIGMA
descriptions.shortDescription: Bespoke advanced swing/scalp ethereum strategy by Trader Origin
descriptions.description:
Welcome to ENIGMA, a bespoke trading algorithm by Trader Origin, designed specifically for Ethereum (ETH) enthusiasts. ENIGMA seamlessly blends scalp and swing trading techniques to offer a dynamic and adaptive approach to the ever-evolving crypto market.

Key Features:

Hybrid Strategy: Combines the precision of scalping with the patience of swing trading, allowing it to capitalize on both short-term market movements and longer-term trends.
Advanced Analytics: Utilizes cutting-edge technical analysis and proprietary indicators to identify optimal entry and exit points.
Risk Management: Implements robust risk management protocols to protect your investment and maximize potential returns.
Real-Time Adjustments: Adapts to changing market conditions in real-time, ensuring that the strategy remains effective in various market environments.

Experience the perfect blend of scalping and swing trading with ENIGMA. Unlock the full potential of Ethereum trading and elevate your trading game with Trader Origin.

descriptions.name: Byzantine
descriptions.shortDescription: Swing Strategy supporting Hedera Hashgraph - HBAR
descriptions.description:
Let’s begin by understanding what being Byzantine fault tolerant actually means. The term Byzantine fault tolerance is derived from a hypothetical scenario called the “Byzantine General’s Problem”.

This hypothetical scenario was developed to describe a situation in which, in order to avoid failure of a distributed system, the system's actors must agree on a concerted strategy, but some of these actors are unreliable. It uses a planned attack on an enemy city by four Byzantine generals. These generals and their armies are each occupying a different side of the city and so are totally separated from each other, making direct, coordinated communication impossible. In order to plan their attack – or retreat – they must use their own messengers to handle communication and so they each send their messengers to share their plan with each other. 

All decentralized networks (distributed ledger, such as a blockchain) have independent nodes that act like the byzantine generals in the hypothetical situation above.

These nodes must come to an agreement, or consensus, on things like: transactions submitted to the network, the ordering of those transactions, and the state of the network itself. These network nodes are likely separated from each other geographically, virtually, architecturally, and sometimes even ethically.
